entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
